name: SONIC REBUILT - SCENE 542
description:
This mini game is part of an elite team of talented artists contributing to 3GI’s reanimate of the 1996 OVA Sonic the Hedgehog, where each and every 735 shots of the film are being reimagined in a different style. This mini game is for their Scene 542. The full movie will be released during the official Sonic The Hedgehog movie on February 14th!

Sonic the Hedgehog is a 55 minute 1996 anime where Robotnik builds an evil robot version of Sonic. It features bright, beautiful animation, which was the main catalyst for this project. We used original audio and art for this project.

CREDITS

Josh Delson | David Wales | Blake Jones 

Jared Le Deoux | Tyler Teich | Melvin McElrath

#sonicmovie #sonicrebuilt
